item.title: Vim: A Design Tool
item.description:
Vim: A Design Tool

In this episode, Charles talks to two other designers about how they've used Vim in their workflow. Klare Frank (a designer from Treehouse) and Adam Morse (a designer from Blue Bottle), join Charles and talk about how they use Vim everyday.

item.title: TACHYONS - Form follows function
item.description:
TACHYONS - Form follows function

Your website should work regardless of a users device or screensize. Don't break the functionality of HTML with CSS. Just because it's readable to you on your laptop, doesn't mean it is readable by your users on their device. Make sure your type is big. Make sure your contrast is high.
